document.full_text: zach randolph scored 25 points, including 9 in the fourth quarter, as he led the memphis grizzlies to their first playoff victory in franchise history.
document.title: grizzlies 101, spurs 98: grizzlies stun no. 1 spurs for first playoff win
lines_and_colors: zach randolph scored 25 points, including 9 in the fourth quarter, as he led the memphis grizzlies to their first playoff victory in franchise history.
